Transcript.Content: [customer connecting with agent - disregard]

Hi
I want to cancel my subscription, but when I do so I am told that I have to pay over 1300 DKK to do so, as it is an annual plan. I have not said anything about an annual plan.

I created the subscription when I was on my education and it was a requirement that we had these programs. Now I'm done and I'm out of money, I can't afford to pay more than DKK 200 a month for something I don't use, and I can't afford to pay the fee to cancel the subscription. I think this is total hustler style that you can never get out of your subscriptions if you are not ready on the date to cancel it.
Hi Henriette, I'm the Adobe Virtual Assistant. How can I help you?
{"genericAttachments":[{"title":"You want to cancel your plan. Is that right?","buttons":[{"text":"Yes","value":"Yes"},{"text":"No","value":"No"}]}]}
Yes
Cancel your Creative Cloud All Apps 100GB plan at account.adobe.com/plans/43DCAEEF85380573D24A/cancel-plan?sa_src=singlePlan
We'll send a confirmation email when you complete the process.

No

No, chat with an agent
Ok. I'll connect you to an agent who can pick up where we've left off.
Your estimated wait time is currently less than one minute.
We'll connect you with an agent as soon as possible. For a faster resolution, please tell us how we can help you today.

CUSTOM_SYSTEM_MESSAGE_You are now connected to Priyanka, who is reviewing your account. If you need to share sensitive information, such as credit card number, please wait for your agent to give you steps to share it securely.
Hello, I'd be happy to help you today, let me first pull up your account information and access your details.

Hi
I want to cancel my subscription, but when I do so I am told that I have to pay over 1300 DKK to do so, as it is an annual plan. I have not said anything about an annual plan.

I created the subscription when I was on my education and it was a requirement that we had these programs. Now I'm done and I'm out of money, I can't afford to pay more than DKK 200 a month for something I don't use, and I can't afford to pay the fee to cancel the subscription. I think this is total hustler style that you can never get out of your subscriptions if you are not ready on the date to cancel it.
the email this account is cornected to I dont even have access to anymore

I do see you have an active subscription for Creative Cloud All Apps 100GB.
Sine the plan is in its new term, it is showing you a fee.

I will help you with the best option available.

Before you make a decision on the cancellation, I see that there are 3 free months on your subscription that haven't been applied yet. If you wish to continue, I can add those to your account and you wouldn't have to pay for the next 3 months. 

 

With this exclusive offer, you will be able to save DKK 712.5. 
How does that sound to you?
I still just want to cancel
I dont just the programs now that i'm done with school
so it is just to much money for nothing

I understand.
I do have a better deal for you which will help you to save more. 

The package is called Photography plan which includes Lightroom and Photoshop. 

  

If you want to switch to this affordable package, I can offer you this plan at DKK 92.50/month(Inc tax)

  

Please let me know if you would like to take this exclusive offer.
But i done want to pay 1300 DKk as a fee to cancel
I dont use them
So it will still be waste of money on something i dont use
and i dont have a job yet
so i have to save where i can

I understand.
If you find use of the plan, I can offer the same plan at a special price of DKK 151.25/Month(Inc tax 
)
 
Please let me know if you wish to take this offer.
no I just want to cancel
but i dont want to pay any fees
for the cancellation

Alright. 

Is there any other Adobe application which suits your need so that I can help you to switch to that subscription?

No i already have access to Lightroom Mobil version thought my one dreve account on my personale email. This account is on my school account that i dont have access to anymore, so i just want to cancel this one

I understand but the reason I was trying to help you with the 3 free months/discounted price/plan change offer is because the plan you are on is for the annual commitment billed monthly and if you wish to cancel the plan now, there would be a termination fees and this was mentioned in the terms and conditions when you initially signed up for the plan and you will be able to view the same using the below link.
Our terms and conditions haven't changed; please review them here: https://www.adobe.com/legal/subscription-terms.html. Per your plan, a cancellation fee of 50% of your remaining contract months applies.
But this plan has just continued without i have accept it for another year
plus i only pay 151 dkk every month tha last year and now it is 237 dkk
it is the never ending subscription
This is so hustler, i have never accepted to another year
I only signed up for this because my eduation demanded that i did

I understand.
 We offer the academic plan at a 60% discount for the first year, which is  DKK 151.25/month. After renewal, the plan changes to a 40% discount, which is DKK 237.50/month.

All Adobe plans get auto renewed. You have already agreed to this term while signing up for the plan.
However, we do send auto renewal reminder email one month prior to the renewal date so that customers can have enough time to decide if they wish to continue with the plan or not.
As per our record, the email was sent to you on 30 Jul 2022.
but i dont have access to the email address you sent that email to
I was locked out from that email account in june
where my education ended
so i have never received or seen that email

I understand. 
The plan you have subscribed to is an annual paid monthly plan wherein you get charged monthly with a term of 12 months. 

You agreed to terms and conditions while signing up for the plan and you have also agreed to the renewal term of the plan.

  

We are also bound to the policy, that is the reason I gave you all options available so that you can save the extra cost. 

Please let me know how you wish to proceed now.
So no matter what i have to keep paying for something i dont use for a year because you guys have sent email to an account that doesn't exist anymore
why does this renewal come up when i log in on my computer

I totally understand.
As I mentioned in the previous message, you also agreed to the renewal term while signing up for the plan.
We are also bound to the policy, that is the reason I gave you all options available so that you can save the extra cost.
So this is seriouly just a scam to make people keep paying
The renewal has just happen and there are now way you or a manage can do anything
its not like i have use it for 6 month and then want to cancel

I have successfully cancelled the plan and as a goodwill gesture I have also waived off the cancellation fee. You will not get charged for the same in the future. You can still use the services till 28 Sep 2022.
 
You will also receive the confirmation email for your cancellation request.
Thank you so much. Can i get you to sent the receive to an email address i have access to stenderuph@gmail.com

Due to data protection policy, we will be unable to send the email to a different email address.
You can keep a note of the reference number. It is ADB-25892852-L6L3
Okay thank you, i have taken screenshots of this number

You're welcome!
 Happy to help. You may receive an email with a survey link. Please take a moment to rate your experience and help us improve. Thanks!
I love to take the survey but if comes to the email address on the account i cant answer it
But thanks again for your help i appreciate it

I understand.
You're welcome!
Take care, bye!
bye
